subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Adam Oates, the onetime center who is set to be inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame, is helping coach the Hershey Bears while the N.H.L. remains in a lockout.
snippet: Adam Oates, the onetime center who is set to be inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame, is helping coach the Hershey Bears while the N.H.L. remains in a lockout.
